Pre-Game Insights: MacKenzie Gore takes the mound, and hopes to perform as 'MacK the knife' to help the Nationals.
The Nationals need to go 2-0 to surpass their 2023 win total of 71.
Stone Garrett made his first start of the season and 401 days after breaking his leg, going 3-4 with a walk and a triple-shy of a cycle.
The Nationals are big underdogs (+170) to win on the moneyline.
Manager Dave Martinez had the big lead and rested his bullpen.
The Nationals' starting pitchers have a combined ERA of 4.39, ranking 23rd in MLB.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game is at Nationals Park, Washington, D.C., with 1st Pitch at 4:05 pm EDT.
The game will be televised on MASN and can be heard on 106.7 The Fan radio and via the MLB app, with Spanish broadcasts on DC 87.7 FM and La Pantera 100.7 FM/1220 AM, and Sirius/XM on Channel 180.
The Nationals won on 09/28 against the Cleveland Indians, moving their record to 92-69.
The Nationals finished their regular season on 09/30 with a record of 92-62, finishing in first place in the NL East.
Trevor Williams adds pitching flexibility to the Nationals' roster.
The Nats are short a superstar they coveted.
